history.proof: unfold transitive. intros x y z Hxy Hyz. sauto depth: 3.

ctx: intros x y z Hxy Hyz.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) x, y, z : Term Hxy : eqTerm x y Hyz : eqTerm y z Unable to unify "(let (a, a') := x in fun H'2 : Term => let (b, b') := H'2 in eqA a b /\\ a' = b') y" with "CoefStructure Term ?A0 ?A1 eqTerm ?plusA ?invA ?minusA ?multA ?divA".

ctx: intros x y z Hxy Hyz.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) x, y, z : Term Hxy : eqTerm x y Hyz : eqTerm y z Unable to unify "(let (a, a') := y in fun H'2 : Term => let (b, b') := H'2 in eqA a b /\\ a' = b') z" with "CoefStructure Term ?A0 ?A1 eqTerm ?plusA ?invA ?minusA ?multA ?divA".

original: intros. unfold transitive. intros x y z Hxy Hyz. eapply eqA_trans. apply Hxy. apply Hyz.
